projects.title: git2jamf
projects.description: A github action that synchronizes Git repositories with Jamf Pro, streamlining the deployment of scripts and configurations and allowing for version control missing in JAMF.
features: Automated synchronization between Git repositories and Jamf Pro

projects.title: resume
projects.description: this resume is defined in github and deployed through github actions to a static site. The resume is built using React and Tailwind CSS, and the content is managed through JSON files.
features: Leverages CI/CD (github actions) for automated lint, build, test and deploy
